64// WARNING: please DON'T CHANGE the order/values of the fields below!
65// (otherwise python tools that generate data will need to be modified too)
66typedef struct {
67 uint32_t bitmap_offset;
68 uint32_t encoding : 1;
69 uint32_t width : 6;
70 uint32_t x_min_offset : 4;
71 uint32_t y_min_offset : 6;
72 uint32_t x_max_offset : 4;
73 uint32_t y_max_offset : 6;
74} nbgl_font_character_t;
75
80typedef struct {
81 uint32_t bitmap_len;
82 uint8_t font_id;
83 uint8_t bpp;
84 uint8_t height;
85 uint8_t line_height;
86 uint8_t char_kerning;
87 uint8_t crop;
88 uint8_t y_min;
89 uint8_t
90 first_char;
91 uint8_t
92 last_char;
93 const nbgl_font_character_t
94 *const characters;
95 uint8_t const *bitmap;
96} nbgl_font_t;
97
98#define BAGL_ENCODING_LATIN1 0
99#define BAGL_ENCODING_UTF8 1
100#define BAGL_ENCODING_DEFAULT BAGL_ENCODING_UTF8
101
106// WARNING: please DON'T CHANGE the order of the fields below!
107// (otherwise python tools that generate data will need to be modified too)
108typedef struct {
109 uint32_t char_unicode : 21;
110 uint32_t encoding : 1;
111 uint32_t width : 6;
112 uint32_t x_min_offset : 4;
113 uint32_t y_min_offset : 6;
114 uint32_t x_max_offset : 4;
115 uint32_t y_max_offset : 6;
116 uint32_t bitmap_offset : 16;
117} nbgl_font_unicode_character_t;
122typedef struct {
123 uint16_t bitmap_len;
124 uint8_t font_id;
125 uint8_t bpp;
126 uint8_t height;
127 uint8_t line_height;
128 uint8_t char_kerning;
129 uint8_t crop;
130 uint8_t y_min;
131 uint8_t unused[3];
132#if !defined(HAVE_LANGUAGE_PACK)
133 // When using language packs, those 2 pointers does not exists
134 const nbgl_font_unicode_character_t
135 *const characters;
136 uint8_t const *bitmap;
137#endif
138} nbgl_font_unicode_t;
139
140typedef enum {
141 BAGL_FONT_INTER_REGULAR_24px,
142 BAGL_FONT_INTER_SEMIBOLD_24px,
143 BAGL_FONT_INTER_MEDIUM_32px,
144 BAGL_FONT_INTER_REGULAR_24px_1bpp,
145 BAGL_FONT_INTER_SEMIBOLD_24px_1bpp,
146 BAGL_FONT_INTER_MEDIUM_32px_1bpp,
147 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_EXTRABOLD_11px_1bpp = 8u, // on Nano
148 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_LIGHT_16px_1bpp = 9u, // on Nano
149 BAGL_FONT_OPEN_SANS_REGULAR_11px_1bpp = 10u, // on Nano
150 BAGL_FONT_INTER_REGULAR_28px = 11u,
151 BAGL_FONT_INTER_SEMIBOLD_28px = 12u,
152 BAGL_FONT_INTER_MEDIUM_36px = 13u,
153 BAGL_FONT_INTER_REGULAR_28px_1bpp = 14u,
154 BAGL_FONT_INTER_SEMIBOLD_28px_1bpp = 15u,
155 BAGL_FONT_INTER_MEDIUM_36px_1bpp = 16u,
156 BAGL_FONT_LAST // MUST ALWAYS BE THE LAST, FOR AUTOMATED INVALID VALUE CHECKS
157} nbgl_font_id_e;
158
159typedef struct nbgl_unicode_ctx_s {
160 const nbgl_font_unicode_t *font;
161 const nbgl_font_unicode_character_t *characters;
162 const uint8_t *bitmap;
163 uint32_t unicode_character_byte_count;
164} nbgl_unicode_ctx_t;
